content_html: Donald Trump has said those applying for H-1B visas will have to pay $100,000, roughly 60 times the current fee,  starting Sunday.
content_text: Donald Trump has said those applying for H-1B visas will have to pay $100,000, roughly 60 times the current fee, starting Sunday.
summary: Donald Trump has said those applying for H-1B visas will have to pay $100,000, roughly 60 times the current fee,  starting Sunday.
title: India warns new US fee for H-1B visa will have 'humanitarian consequences'
